lines: 1. Let us break bread together on our knees; Let us break bread together on our knees.
Refrain : When I fall on my knees, With my face to the risen Son, O Lord, have mercy on me.
2. Let us drink wine together on our knees; Let us drink wine together on our knees.
3. Let us praise God together on our knees; Let us praise God together on our knees.
